    webduino.transport.MqttTransport

    Extends webduino.Transport

    Conveying messages over MQTT protocol.

    CONNECT_TIMEOUT

    Number static

    Defined in src/transport/MqttTransport.js:195

    Time to wait before throwing connection timeout exception. Measured in seconds.

    Number static

    Defined in src/transport/MqttTransport.js:186

    Number static

    Defined in src/transport/MqttTransport.js:177
